Declare @TmpTable Table (shift_id nvarchar(100) ,sales_qty int ,sales_total_amount decimal(18,4)
,row_no int );
insert into @TmpTable (shift_id,sales_qty,sales_total_amount,row_no)
select shift_id ,a.sales_qty ,a.sales_total_amount ,row_number() over(order by a.shift_id) row_no from T_Shift a
where 1=1
a.unit_id in ( $UnitIds$ )
a.sales_user in ( #UserNames# )
a.pos_date >= #order_date_begin#
a.pos_date <= #order_date_end#
;
statements.select: select COUNT(*) icount ,sum(a.sales_qty) sales_total_qty ,convert(decimal(18,4),sum(a.sales_total_amount)) sales_total_total_amount ,convert(decimal(18,4),sum(b.deposit_amount)) total_deposit_amount ,convert(decimal(18,4),sum(b.sale_amount)) total_sale_amount ,convert(decimal(18,4),sum(b.return_amount)) total_return_amount From @TmpTable a inner join T_Shift b on(a.shift_id = b.shift_id);

select b.shift_id ,b.pos_id ,b.parent_shift_id ,b.unit_id ,b.sales_user ,b.deposit_amount ,b.sale_amount ,b.return_amount ,b.pos_date ,b.sales_qty ,b.sales_total_amount ,b.open_time ,b.close_time ,b.create_time ,b.create_user_id ,b.modify_time ,b.modify_user_id ,c.unit_name ,a.row_no From @TmpTable a inner join t_shift b on(a.shift_id = b.shift_id) inner join t_unit c on(b.unit_id = c.unit_id) where 1=1 and a.row_no > #StartRow# and a.row_no <= #EndRow# order by b.sale_amount desc ;
